columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Time of data recording in 15-minute intervals.

columns.name: Reactive_Power_kVAR_
columns.description: Reactive power measurement in kilovolt-amperes reactive, indicates energy efficiency.

columns.name: Power_Factor
columns.description: Ratio of real power to apparent power, showing efficiency of power usage (usually between 0.8 and 1.0).

columns.name: Solar_Power_kW_
columns.description: Power generated from solar sources in kilowatts.

columns.name: Wind_Power_kW_
columns.description: Power generated from wind sources in kilowatts.

columns.name: Grid_Supply_kW_
columns.description: Power drawn from the electrical grid in kilowatts.

columns.name: Voltage_Fluctuation_
columns.description: Measurement of voltage variability or instability in the system.

columns.name: Overload_Condition
columns.description: Binary indicator of system overload (1 = overload, 0 = normal).

columns.name: Transformer_Fault
columns.description: Binary indicator of transformer fault occurrence (1 = fault, 0 = normal).

columns.name: Temperature_C_
columns.description: Ambient temperature measurement in degrees Celsius.

columns.name: Humidity_
columns.description: Relative humidity measurement as a percentage.

columns.name: Electricity_Price_USD_kWh_
columns.description: Cost of electricity in US dollars per kilowatt-hour.

columns.name: Predicted_Load_kW_
columns.description: Forecasted power load in kilowatts, target variable for energy prediction.
